channel.title: NEET 2025 Updates
channel.description: Latest updates and information regarding NEET 2025

item.title: Reporting of Suspicious Claims in NEET(UG) 2025 Examination
item.description:
Reporting of Suspicious Claims in NEET(UG) 2025

A dedicated platform has been launched by the National Testing Agency (NTA) to report suspicious claims regarding the NEET(UG) 2025 Examination.

NTA advises candidates not to be misled by unscrupulous elements who indulge in malpractice and deceive candidates with false claims.

Suspicious Activities to Report:

  • Unauthorized websites or social media accounts claiming NEET (UG) 2025 paper access
  • Individuals claiming access to exam content
  • Impersonators posing as NTA or Government Officials

The reporting form is simple, allowing users to describe what they observed, where and when it occurred, and upload supporting files.

This initiative aligns with the Public Examinations (Prevention of Unfair Means) Act, 2024, aimed at eliminating unfair practices in public examinations.

Reporting Deadline:

Until 5:00 PM IST on May 4, 2025

Report at:

  • https://nta.ac.in
  • https://neet.nta.nic.in

Click here to report suspicious claims

item.title: NEET 2025 Advance City Intimation Slip Released
item.description:
NEET 2025 City Intimation Slip Released

NEET UG 2025 Advance City Intimation Slip has been released.

Candidates can now check their allotted city by visiting the official portal.

Click here to check your city


Note: This is not the Admit Card. The official Admit Card will be released separately.

Exam Date:

May 4, 2025

Admit Card Expected:

End of April 2025

Contact Details:

  • Email: neetug2025@nta.ac.in
  • Phone 1: 011-40759000
  • Phone 2: 011-69227700

item.title: NEET 2025 Syllabus
item.description: Download the official NEET 2025 syllabus to prepare for your exams. Source: nmc.org.in

item.title: NEET 2025 Exam Date and Important Information
item.description:
NEET 2025 will be held on 4th May 2025.
The exam duration is 180 minutes from 2 PM to 5 PM.
Submission of application forms is open from 7th Feb to 7th Mar.
No correction facility will be provided after registration.
Extra time will not be given for filling out the OMR sheet.
Be extremely careful while filling out the application form.
NTA is ensuring strict regulations this year.

item.title: Correction Window for NEET (UG)-2025 is LIVE!
item.description: NEET (UG)-2025 Correction Window is now open. Candidates can make necessary corrections to their application forms. Source: neet.nta.nic.in

item.title: Clarification on Question Paper Pattern and Examination Duration for NEET (UG)-2025
item.description: Official clarification regarding the question paper pattern and examination duration for NEET (UG)-2025 has been released. Candidates are advised to review the details. Source: neet.nta.nic.in

item.title: Reminder for NEET(UG) 2025 Registration
item.description: Reminder: The registration window for NEET (UG) 2025 is closing soon. Ensure you complete your application before the deadline. Source: neet.nta.nic.in
